page.title: 05Trade and Commerce (1)
page.content:
There is a large haulage contractors' depot in the village, who are sub-contracted to Mornflake Oats of Crewe, so consequently the lorries go all over the country.
There are 2 garages serving the immediate area.One is situated in the village of Wybunbury and does small repairs to cars.The proprietor also sells petrol and oil. The site has at one time seen better days; the forecourt is of ash and the petrol pumps are of the clock type.The site is at present for sale.
There is a second garage in the area, at Walgherton, about half a mile from Wybunbury.The proprietor sells petrol, does major repairs and services and is an Austin-Morris agent.He also builds and hires out light trailers.
